amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding for any nonrecourse loan program for the 1998 crop of quota peanuts with a national average loan rate in excess of $550 per ton.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 17 in the Congressional Record of July 17, 1997, to reduce the price support for peanut crops from $610 per ton to $550 per ton.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neumann amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 242 (Roll no. 314).
